/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, immersed in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades adorned with vibrant signs and advertisements, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars and buses traverse the road, weaving their way through the city's arteries. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, contributing to the dynamic energy of the scene. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being enveloped by the city.
